availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James H. Sawyer (Logan County, Kentucky, farm laborer)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, farm laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Dorcus A. Sawyer. Father of Mary C. Sawyer, Almarine Sawyer, Elizabeth Sawyer, Valentine Sawyer, Caroline Sawyer, Martha Sawyer, and Benjamin Sawyer. Married to Almeta Sawyer. Farmer in Logan County in 1850. Farm laborer in Logan County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 39. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 121.
